Author: The Archipendium Contributors
Name: Archipendium
Punchline: A plugin for giving hints for your Archipelago games.
Description:
A plugin for giving hints for your Archipelago games.

Hint tokens obtained from:
- Fates
- Gold Saucer
- PvP
- The Hunt
- Crafting Collectables
- Gathering Collectables
- Ishgard Restoration
- Allied Society Quests
- Faux Hallows
- Island Sanctuary
- Cosmic Exploration
- Eureka
- Bozja
- Occult Cresent
- Endwalker & Dawntrail Extreme Trials
- Endwalker & Dawntrail Savage Raids
- Dawntrail Alliance Raids
- Dawntrail Chaotic Raids
- Ultimate Raids
